feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: I quite long to see the dear man.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: It serves me right! What business had I to put on all my best things and come philandering down here, hoping to see the Professor?

feels.name: Happiness
feels.quote: feeling as if the sun had suddenly burst out with uncommon brilliancy, that the world was all right again, and that one thoroughly happy woman was paddling through the wet that day.

Places.name: At home
Places.description: Jo's home where she longs to see Mr. Bhaer.

Places.name: In the street
Places.description: Where Jo realizes her actions and feels regret.

Places.name: Walking together
Places.description: Where Jo feels happiness walking arm-in-arm with Mr. Bhaer.
